channel.title: Sunglasses Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sunglasses Village" - The village hidden in The Surface is looking for villagers!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: We're still recruiting, auto-accept on. We're rich for starting out, lots of perms available and fun villagers who will help. We just need a couple more people to get started.

item.title: Sunglasses Village
item.content:encoded: I just started my village, Sunglasses Village, with some people from my old one, New Kamina, because we had great fun in that one. So we're trying to build a new, fun village which helps people get along in the game. We accept everyone and help our villagers to the best we can
